Mayor & City Council
====================

Mayor & City Council
--------------------

Regular City Council Meetings are held at 6 p.m. on the 1st and 3rd Tuesday of the month at the New Service Center, 448 State Highway 75 North Huntsville, TX 77320. All City Council meetings are open to the public. To address the Council, arrive before the meeting to complete a Public Comment Card for items on the Agenda and place it on the City Secretary's desk prior to the start of the meeting.Â Resolution of a variety of issues is often most quickly achieved by contacting the appropriate City department and/or the City Manager's office. Â Council meetings are streamed live on the City websiteÂ [here Mayor & City Council](http://huntsvilletx.gov/550/Watch-Meeting-Videos).

### Contact Us

1. ### City Hall

   **Physical location:**

   1220 11th Street

   Huntsville, TX 77340

   **Mailing address:**

   1212 Avenue M

   Huntsville, TX 77340

   [Get Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/dir//1220+11th+Street,+Huntsville,+TX/@30.7240156,-95.593453,13z/data=!4m8!4m7!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x86470885946f5e83:0x9c815cfbe26681c6!2m2!1d-95.5522533!2d30.7240221?entry=ttu)

   Phone: 936-291-5413

   Fax: 936-291-5409

   **Hours**

   Monday - Friday

   8 a.m. - 5 p.m.

   [Staff Directory](https://www.huntsvilletx.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=16)

Contact the Entire City Council
-------------------------------

Please use Council@HuntsvilleTX.gov when sending special event invitations or emailing the full Council.
